audioJson.name: Open reel tape
audioJson.aka: Magnetophone, magnetic tape, reel-to-reel, open reel audio
audioJson.fact1: A common tape speed is 7 1/2 inches per second (ips); other recording speeds are 3 3/4, 15, and 30 ips
audioJson.fact2: This format is available in many widths: 1/4", 1/2" 1" and 2" are the most common widths
audioJson.fact3: This was the primary format used by professional recording studios until the late 1980s
